Welcome to the *alpseq* documentation website! This page aims to explain how to run the *alpseq* nextflow pipeline, as well as the companion *alpseqR* R package.

## Useful links

-   The [*alpseq* preprint](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2025.10.22.661623v1)

-   The [example data](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/view/PRJEB90877) used to develop *alpseq*

-   [Another useful public dataset](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=PRJNA638614) and its [corresponding paper](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32887876/)
